name: The Hawk
description: $Unbroken isn't just a token - it's a symbol of strength and perseverance. It represents everyone who's soared through bull runs, been rugged, lost it all, and still refuses to quit. Like the hawk that inspired its name, pierced by an arrow but still flying - $Unbroken stands for those who keep rising no matter what. This isn't just a coin; it's a movement of faith, resilience, and unstoppable spirit.
